snippet.title: Glover (QUByte Classics) | Launch Trailer - Switch, PS4, PS5 and Xbox One/Series S|X
snippet.description:
Glover is available for Playstation 4, Playstation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S and Nintendo Switch!

Glover is new! Glover is cool! Glover is the hero! Glover is... a glove! And he’ll save the kingdom In his own unique way! 

He throws, dribbles, bounces, and rolls a rubber ball across six massive worlds, gradually collecting the scattered crystals.

Get your Glover on:
Xbox: https://tinyurl.com/GloverXBOX
PSN: https://tinyurl.com/GloverPSN
Nintendo: https://tinyurl.com/GloverSWITCH

PS4 Physical version
Physical Mania: https://www.physicalmania.com/
___________________________________

Follow QUByte on socials:
https://twitter.com/qubytegames
https://www.instagram.com/qubyteinteractive/
https://www.discord.gg/qubyte

About QUByte Interactive
QUByte is a Brazilian Game Developer and the largest Latin American Publisher on consoles. Our goal is to develop the industry through Porting and Publishing partnerships making games available to a broader audience on all major platforms, so they can realize their full potential.

All rights reserved © 2025 QUByte Interactive.
